sample.title: Diffie-Hellman AES Video Audio Chat
Diffie-Hellman AES-Video-Audio-Chat
sample.summary: Diffie-Hellman AES Video and Audio Chat
sample.description: This template shows an AES encrypted video and audio chat which uses Diffie-Hellman to exchange an encryption key.
Diese Vorlage zeigt einen AES-verschlüsselten Video-Audio-Chat, der mittels Diffie-Hellman den Verschlüsselungsschlüssel austauscht.
sample.keywords: Diffie, Hellman, AES, Videochat, Camera, Network

replacement.value: This template shows an AES encrypted video and audio chat over an IP-based Network without any preshared key.\line\line You have to set the ip of your chat partner below in order to connect to him. By default you will connect to yourself.\line\line This template works basically in two phases.\line In the first phase it will exchange an 128 bit AES session key with itself or with a remote version of itself, by using the Diffie-Hellman key exchange.\line\line If the key is exchanged it will starts the video chat and encrypt the packets with the session key.
On start:\line Choose a G and a P, calculate A and send a\line dh_start msg with P and A.\line Wait for response, get B to calculate s.
On receiving a dh_start msg:\line Get P and A calculate B and s.\line Send B back.
